Based on the user's preferences, I would recommend the movie "Aladdin" (1992) to them.
The movie is based on a popular Disney animated film called "Aladdin and the Magic Lamp" (1980).
The movie tells the story of a young prince named Aladdin who lives in a small kingdom ruled by his father, King Shahzan.
One day while wandering through an uncharted desert, Aladdin finds a genie lamp which contains a magic lamp and a magic carpet that can take him anywhere he wants to go.
Aladdin uses his magic carpet to travel back to his kingdom where he meets Princess Jasmine who is also in love with Prince Aladdin.
Princess Jasmine tells Aladdin that she has been waiting for someone like him to come along and save her from the evil sorcerer Jafar who has been using Princess Jasmine as a pawn in his evil plans against Aladdin's kingdom.
After hearing about Princess Jasmine's situation, Aladdin decides to take Princess Jasmine back to his kingdom where he can help her escape from Jafar's clutches.
To do this, Aladdin uses his magic carpet to travel across the desert to reach his kingdom where he can assist Princess Jasmine in escaping from Jafar's grasp.

At the end of the movie, after Aladdin and Princess Jasmine have successfully escaped from Jafar's clutches back to their kingdoms, they both decide to stay together forever as their greatest wish has come true now that they have successfully escaped from Jafar's clutches back to their kingdoms.
After hearing about Aladdin and Princess Jasmine's situations at the end of the movie, I would recommend the movie "Aladdin" (1992) to them.
